EmailTemplate.description: Distributor Detail: SG, MY, PH, and ID
EmailTemplate.name: Nomex® Paper
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Reply: Inquiry Forwarded to Faxolif Industries Pte Ltd
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}, Thank you for your interest in our product, Nomex® Paper.
Please be informed that your inquiry has already been forwarded to our distributor:
Faxolif Industries Pte Ltd
Address: 75 Tech Park Cres, Singapore 638070
Phone: (65) 6862 8898
Att: Mr. Y K Cheong
Email : ykcheong@trafomaterials.sg
The process normally takes between 24-48 hours to process. Please kindly wait for the contact.
Again, thank you for contacting DuPont and we hope to be at your service again in the future.
Warm Regards, DuPont Inquiry Management Center, Asia Pacific
